newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: ENDEMOL AND RTL CONCLUDE 3-YR CONTRACT.
newsitem.headline: ENDEMOL AND RTL CONCLUDE 3-YR CONTRACT.

text.p: Television production company Endemol Entertainment said on Monday it had reached a basic agreement with German commercial television station RTL Television on a long-term volume contract.
This agreement will be effective as of January 1 1998 and will be valid for three years, it said.
"Looking ahead to the 1997/98 television season, Endemol Entertainment has every faith in being able to achieve the forecasted increase in turnover and profit in the German market," Endemol said.

For the company as a whole Endemol confirms its earlier forecasts regarding growth in turnover and net profit, namely 15 to 20 percent in the financial year 1996/97, with both turnover and profits to double by the year 2001, compared to the financial year 1995/96, it said.
